encrypt(int) - Static method in class de.db.derpate.util.URIParameterEncryptionUtil
Returns a hexadecimal representation of the (with global password and salt) AES256 encrypted int value.
This encryption method should be used, when links are visible to the user.

encrypt(String, String, String) - Static method in class de.db.derpate.util.AES256EncryptionUtil
Encrypts the given text with the given password and salt.
encrypt(String, HttpSession, LoginUser) - Static method in class de.db.derpate.util.URIParameterEncryptionUtil
This static method encrypts the given parameterValue with the HttpSession.getId() as the password and Id.getId() as salt (appending a "0" to the salt, if the number of characters is uneven).
As a salt, the URIParameterEncryptionUtil.DEFAULT_SALT will be used.

escapeHtml() - Method in class de.db.derpate.util.StringEscapeUtilTest
 
escapeHtml(String) - Static method in class de.db.derpate.util.StringEscapeUtil
Escapes the characters in a String using HTML entities.
For example:
"max" & "mustermann"
becomes:
&quot;max&quot; &amp; &quot;mustermann&quot;
escapeJson(String) - Static method in class de.db.derpate.util.StringEscapeUtil
Escapes the characters in a String using Json String rules.
Escapes any values it finds into their Json String form.
